name: nodejs-course-phase2
description: A bit more complicated sample project - phase 2
author: Dmitriy Butakov <dbutakov@lohika.com>

scripts.start: npm run db:start && nodemon --config conf/nodemon.json src/server.js
scripts.postinstall: docker run -p 3360:3306 --name=nodejs-phase2-db -e MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD=secret -e MYSQL_DATABASE=bookshelf -d mysql:5.5 && docker stop nodejs-phase2-db
scripts.uninstall: npm run db:stop || true && docker rm nodejs-phase2-db
